Professional Profile

Senior FullStack Developer with 10+ years of experience, having worked with technologies such as Javascript, NodeJS, VueJS, React, Java, Relational databases, etc. I'm mainly Development oriented, but also have abilities and experience as tech lead, functional analysis, user and technical training.

With more than 15 years of total experience in project implementation, development, analysis and leadership. Having worked with a range of technologies, on all application layers, including:

  • Backend:
    • Java (SpringBoot, JPA/Hibernate, JSF, JSP, etc)
    • Node.js, Express, TypeORM
    • Rest API, SOAP services
  • Frontend:
    • HTML, JS, Typescript, CSS
    • Vue, React, Cordova
    • Rest, GraphQL
  • Data:
    • Oracle PL-SQL, SQL Server T-SQL
  • Others:
    • Scrum
    • CD/CI tools (Jenkins, Sonarcube, etc)

Experience working for projects in El Salvador and abroad, mainly in Chile, Argentina, Mexico and USA, as well as remotely with teams in locations such as USA, Canada, India and Singapore.

Working in the integration of a global CRM system, as part of a global standardization project which aimed to have the same basic system running in all of their offices around the world. Working with Java based IBM Portals technology.
Achievements: Helped integrate CRM system, and also helped other teams to finalize their assignments.

Personal Projects

Covid Maps El Salvador

Covid maps that show how the disease confirmed cases have evolved over time and area in the country, developed with JS/TS, REST API, NodeJs, VueJS, Express, TypeORM, Charts.js

  Github: github.com/tritiumcl/covid-maps-sv       Covid Maps El Salvador: bit.ly/covidmapssv

UglyLinks

Browser Extension to uglify links in websites to mark items you don't want to click anymore. (Typescript, VueJs, Bootstrap, IndexedDB).

  Github: github.com/frank-orellana/UglyLinks    

Diff Viewer

Web Utility to visualize diff files as they are seen in github. (Typescript, VueJs).

  Github: github.com/frank-orellana/diff-viewer       bit.ly/diffviewer

Retailer.org

Retailer.Org is a POS(Point Of Sale) program aimed specially to mini market alike retailers, allowing them to have a real time control of their inventory, sales and other basic data.

  SourceForge: sourceforge.net/projects/retailerorg/
